attributes.action: Break off diplomatic relations with afghanistan
attributes.additional_details:
Afghanistan's president has endorsed a "code of conduct" issued by an influential council of clerics which activists say represents a giant step backwards for women's rights in the country.
In view of this the UK Government should break off Diplomatic Relations with Afganistan
See this link for details:
http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2012/mar/06/hamid-karzai-afghanistan-womens-rights
